snippet: Lindsey Vonn has asked the International Ski Federation for permission to race male skiers in attempt to revamp the image of the women’s alpine skiing.
abstract: Four-time women's overall World Cup champion Lindsey Vonn lobbies International Ski Federation for permission to enter men's downhill race in attempt to revamp image of women’s alpine skiing.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn has asked the International Ski Federation for permission to race male skiers in attempt to revamp the image of the women’s alpine skiing.

headline.seo: Lindsey Vonn Asks to Enter Downhill Race Against Men
headline.main: Vonn Seeks to Race Men in Downhill Race
